name: Sacred Harvester

name: The Dagger of Darts

name: Unrelenting Phalanx
passive: Phalanx now casts twice.

name: Lion's Claw

passive: Increases the maximum stack count of Sweeping Wind by 3.

name: Madstone

name: Dread Iron
passive: Ground Stomp causes an Avalanche.

passive: Frenzy gains the effect of every rune.

name: Belt of the Trove

name: Belt of Transcendence
passive: Summon a Fetish Sycophant when you hit with a Mana spender.

name: Omryn's Chain

name: Nilfur's Boast

name: Spirit Guards
passive: Your Spirit Generators reduce your damage taken by 30–40% for 3 seconds.

name: Drakon's Lesson

name: Golden Flense
passive: Sweep Attack restores 4–6 Wrath for each enemy hit.

name: Broken Crown

name: The Gavel of Judgment

name: Triumvirate

name: Dead Man's Legacy
passive: Multishot hits enemies below 50–60% health twice.

name: Skull Grasp
passive: Increase the damage of Whirlwind by 300–400% weapon damage.

name: The Short Man's Finger

name: Arcstone
passive: Lightning pulses periodically between all wearers of this item, dealing 1000–1500% weapon damage.

name: Halo of Arlyse
passive: Your Ice Armor now reduces damage from melee attacks by 50–60% and automatically casts Frost Nova whenever you take 10% of your Life in damage.

name: Ivory Tower
passive: Blocks release forward a Fires of Heaven.

name: Denial
passive: Each enemy hit by your Sweep Attack increases the damage of your next Sweep Attack by 30–40%, stacking up to 5 times.

name: Wormwood
passive: Locust Swarm continuously plagues enemies around you.

name: Gesture of Orpheus
passive: Reduces the cooldown of Slow Time by 30–40%.

name: Hunter's Wrath

name: Sacred Harness
passive: Judgment gains the effect of the Debilitate rune and is cast at your landing location when casting Falling Sword.

name: Fazula's Improbable Chain

name: Binding of the Lost

passive: Strafe projectiles pierce.

name: Kymbo's Gold

passive: Prevent all Poison damage taken and heal yourself for 10–15% of the amount prevented.

passive: Slain enemies rest in pieces.

name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker
passive: Chance on hit to blast your enemy with Lightning, dealing 279–372% weapon damage as Lightning and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Each enemy hit has their attack speed and movement speed reduced by 30% for 3 seconds. Jumps up to 5 targets.

name: Rimeheart
passive: 10% chance on hit to instantly deal 10000% weapon damage as Cold to enemies that are Frozen.

name: In-geom
passive: Your skill cooldowns are reduced by 8–10 seconds for 15 seconds after killing an elite pack.

name: Shard of Hate
passive:
Elemental skills have a chance to trigger a powerful attack that deals 200–250% weapon damage:
   Cold skills trigger Freezing Skull
   Poison skills trigger Poison Nova
   Lightning skills trigger Charged Bolt

name: Scourge
passive: 20–45% chance when attacking to explode with demonic fury for 1800-2000% weapon damage as Fire.

name: Blade of Prophecy
passive: Two Condemned enemies also trigger Condemn's explosion.

name: Maximus
passive: Chance on hit to summon a Demonic Slave.

name: Stalgard's Decimator
passive: Your melee attacks throw a piercing axe at a nearby enemy, dealing 550–700% weapon damage as Physical.

name: Cam's Rebuttal
passive: Falling Sword can be used again within 4 seconds before the cooldown is triggered.

name: Blood Brother
passive: Grants a 15–20% chance to block attacks. Blocked attacks inflict 30% less damage. After blocking an attack, your next attack inflicts 30% additional damage.

name: Corrupted Ashbringer
passive: Chance on kill to raise a skeleton to fight for you. Upon accumulating 5 skeletons, they each explode for 1000% weapon damage and the sword transforms into Ashbringer for a short time. Attacking with Ashbringer burns your enemy for 5000–6000% weapon damage as Holy.

name: Tiklandian Visage
passive: Horrify causes you to Fear and Root enemies around you for 6–8 seconds.

name: The Grin Reaper
passive: Chance when attacking to summon horrific Mimics that cast some of your equipped skills.

name: Quetzalcoatl
passive: Locust Swarm and Haunt now deal their damage in half of the normal duration.

name: Visage of Giyua
passive: Summon a Fetish Army after you kill 2 Elites.

name: Carnevil
passive: The 5 Fetishes closest to you will shoot a powerful Poison Dart every time you do.

name: Mask of Jeram
passive: Pets deal 75–100% more damage.

name: Slorak's Madness
passive: This wand finds your death humorous.

name: Wand of Woh
passive: 3 additional Explosive Blasts are triggered after casting Explosive Blast.

name: Serpent's Sparker
passive: You may have one extra Hydra active at a time.

name: Dark Mage's Shade
passive: Automatically cast Diamond Skin when you fall below 35% Life. This effect may occur once every 15–20 seconds.

name: Storm Crow
passive: 20–40% chance to cast a fiery ball when attacking.

name: Archmage's Vicalyke
passive: Your Mirror Images have a chance to multiply when killed by enemies.

name: Velvet Camaral
passive: Double the number of enemies your Electrocute jumps to.

name: The Magistrate
passive: Frost Hydra now periodically casts Frost Nova.

name: Crown of the Primus
passive: Slow Time gains the effect of every rune.

name: Demon Machine
passive: 35–65% chance to shoot explosive bolts when attacking.

name: Hellrack
passive: Chance to root enemies to the ground when you hit them.

name: Buriza-Do Kyanon
passive: Your projectiles pierce 1–2 additional times.

name: Pus Spitter
passive: 25–50% chance to lob an acid blob when attacking.

name: Chanon Bolter
passive: Your Spike Traps lure enemies to them. Enemies may be taunted once every 12–16 seconds.

name: Wojahnni Assaulter
passive: Rapid Fire deals 30–40% more damage for every second that you channel. Stacks up to 4 times.

name: Smoking Thurible
passive: Equip on Follower: Your follower cannot die.

name: Hand of the Prophet
passive: Equip on Follower: Gain access to all skills.

name: Vadim's Surge
passive: Equip on Follower: Reduce the cooldown of all Follower skills by 50%.

name: Skeleton Key
passive: Equip on Follower: Your follower cannot die.

name: Ribald Etchings
passive: Equip on Follower: Gain access to all skills.

name: Slipka's Letter Opener
passive: Equip on Follower: Reduce the cooldown of all Follower skills by 50%.

name: Enchanting Favor
passive: Equip on Follower: Your follower cannot die.

name: Relic of Akarat
passive: Equip on Follower: Gain access to all skills.

name: Hillenbrand's Training Sword
passive: Equip on Follower: Reduce the cooldown of all Follower skills by 50%.
